name: Tuna Man Squid - Happiness in the Dark
name_original: Tuna Man Squid - Happiness in the Dark
description:
Tuna Man Squid - Happiness in the Dark is a shooter game developed by Ltank129. It was originally released in 2016.
You can play Tuna Man Squid - Happiness in the Dark on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
